attributes.action: reject any extension to the state funding of political parties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only way to ensure that political parties remain answerable to the British public is to reject any extension to the state funding of political parties, making their existence dependent on openly declared voluntary donations.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reject any extension to the state funding of political parties."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14456.asp

Prime Minister's Office
